dataset_description: A trainee has been assigned before your arrival to prepare the training data for you. To do this, he took all the transactions of the last 12 months (from 08/2019 to 09/2020), isolated the one from the last month (09/2020), and constructed the target variable over this last month as repurchase = 1 if the customer bought in 09/2020, 0 otherwise.
